Title: Seiko Chronograph V657-6180. Gents blue dial. Retro. Imported. Circa Nov 2000
Description: Seiko V657-6180 This is a really scarce Seiko chronograph using the popular (now discontinued) V657 movement.Dating to November 2000 this was one of the last models produced (the 7t92 was introduced soon after).This oversized model was never sold in the UK, import only. ** Case **Brushed and stainless steel - satin finish. 41mm diameter (43mm with crown).Screw down crown.Mineral glass. ** Strap**Original stainless steel bracelet, reference 49N7-B-E18mm hidden lug fitting.Fold over locking clasp with push button release.Total length approx 8.25" with 7 removable links fitted ** Dial **Metallic blue dial with recessed sub-dials ringed in white.Steel and luminous minute/hour hands. Steel chronograph handsHour markers are powerful luminous blocks cut into the chapter ring.Date at 4 position. ** Movement **Quartz V657 calibre chronograph.Times in 1/10th second increments up to 60 minutes.This is one of the very few chronographs with centre seconds hand(i.e. the main second hand is constantly moving, not used as part of the chronograph).New battery fitted, perfect working order. ** Condition **Good condition but the watch shows very light signs of wear consummate with age.It keeps excellent time and all functions work correctly. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~Excellent example of a rare imported Seiko Chronograph.~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Please be aware that I cannot guarantee water resistance on pre-owned watches. Thanks for looking.
